atlantis_talk_04_botan_01:
Are you serious? Even I know about your dad.
He’s on the board of the Rotom Phone company![VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_02: Wait, how do you know that?![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_botan_02:
Everyone knows that. He’s famous. And I guess
I looked into him for my own reasons, too.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_04_friend_02:
So Nemona’s actually some pampered little
princess from a rich family?[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_03: Ugh! No! No way! That’s so not my thing.[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_05:
I guess you could say Mother and Father were,
like...hands-off but in a good way?[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_06:
My big sister’ll probably take over the business,
so they pretty much let me do what I wanted.[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_botan_03:
That is some pampered little princess stuff
right there.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_07:
Gaah! Cállate, Penny! What, is your family super
normal, then?[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_botan_06:
It’s just my dad! He’s loud and clingy and makes
up weird nicknames for me, like “Pen-pen.”[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_04_botan_07:
He’s the most annoying guy in the world! Period!
He’s the worst![VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_04_friend_04:
Man, that’s a real downer...for your dad.
Having his own daughter describe him like that...[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_04_botan_08: Don’t you dare take his side![VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_09:
Uhhhhhh...[VAR TRNAME(0000)]! How ’bout you?
Your mother seemed super nice.[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_rival_10:
Yup! Got a glimpse of an amazing-looking
sandwich she made, too![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_04_friend_06:
Really? Wish I could’ve seen that. I bet it tasted
great...[VAR 0114(0006)]
